summary:
Immortals in Skyrim.
Don\\\'t lose your head
descriptionHtml:
This is the Highlanders and The Kurgan as playable races.  
Kurgan\'s Sword is on Steam\'s Workshop by Dafini
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=186114462

Your abilities are water breathing, avoid death, and crazy high health regeneration. 

Both races have alittle different of a description so I wanted to pack both into this mod so everyone can enjoy.

Ghosu\\\'s Highlander swords here on the Nexus are awesome companions for your highlander.

If anyone would like to help me making a quest or npc\\\'s and factions that would be awesome. But for now just the races for everyone.
author: KalEltheKryptonian
